changelog: New features:/n- Bookmarking functionality/n- UI changes/n- The ability to select watch region/n- More metadata like Trivia, Goofs, Quotes from imDB/n- Added option for list or grid view/n- Account creation to sync bookmarked movies and TV shows in the future/n- News section/n- Material 3 (You) color theming (works on Android 12+)/n- Monochrome Android icon for Android 13+ devices
